nodes.text: A bofa treat was a food eaten as a dessert or as a snack. It was made with fruit and a crust made from cereal.
Bofa treats were sweet, dried, fruit-based snack foods. They were green in appearance. In addition to being made of dried fruit, bofa treats consisted of a crust made of cereal.
During 1.5 ABY, a gang called the Bofa Treat Gang named themselves after this dessert. They were a rival to the Meatlump Gang, a terrorist group which named itself after the meatlump.

Bofa treats appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. In the game, they appeared green and leafy. However, the same graphical model for bofa treats was used for other items in the game.

No source has specified that bofa treats came from the Bofa system or Bofa II. Also, while bofa treats were made out of some sort of fruit, no source has made a connection between the treats and the bofa fruit.
